english_example_sentence: In this large factory, even tired workers are regular workers.
russian_example_sentence: На этой большой фабрике даже уставшие рабочие являются постоянными работниками.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu büyük fabrikada yorgun işçiler bile düzenli çalışanlar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu büyük fabrikada yorgun işçiler bile düzenli ______.
